level.heading: Claims procedure.
level.text: In accordance with regulations issued by the Board, the Board shall provide to any participant or beneficiary who has a claim for benefits under a retirement program denied:
Adequate written notice of such denial, setting forth the specific reasons for such denial in a manner calculated to be understood by such participant or beneficiary; and
A reasonable opportunity for a full and fair review of the decision denying such claim.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-354 substituted "In accordance with regulations issued by the Board, the Board shall" for "In accordance with regulations of the Council, the Mayor shall".

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority under Law 4-123, see Mayor's Order 83-245, October 14, 1983.
